MV TONG DE 56 -  (40K) 2011 BLT - OPEN TIANJIN, CHINA - O/A 26-28TH AUG 2024 IAGW WOG
GEARLESS, CIS OK / SP OR ONE TCT
MV TONG DE 56
TYPE: BULK CARRIER
IMO: 8672641
CLASS: ICS
FLAG: PANAMA
BUILT:07th nov-2011 /Zhejiang Qifeng Shipbuilding Co., Ltd CHINA ,
DWAT/DRAFT/TPC: SSW ABT. 40380.03MT ON 10.69M（Summer Load Water Line)/ 50.934
LOA/BEAM/DEP: 189.23 M / 30.0M/15.20M
GT/NT:  25045/ 14751
HOLDS/HATCHES: 5 / 5
HATCH COVER: HYDRAULIC OPERATED DOUBLE SKIN FOLDING TYPE
HATCH DIMENSIONS:
NO.1: 16.50M X 15.80M
NO. 2+3+4+5: 20.25M x 15.80M
CARGO CAPACITES:
GRAIN/M3: 52772.22
CRANES ：NIL
SPEED/CONSUMPTION AS VESSEL TRADING AT OPEN SEA FOR 24 HOURS:
BALLAST :ABT 11.0KN ON ABT 12.8MT + ABT 1.5MT VLSFO（generator）（total14.3MT  VLSFO) +0.1MT MGO
LADEN:ABT 10.0 KN ON ABT 13.8MT VLSFO +  ABT 1.5MT VLSFO（generator）（total15.3MT VLSFO)    +0.1MT MGO
PORT CONSUMPTION:
IDLE:  ABT 1.8MTS VLSFO+0.1MT MGO
WORK:（Ballast operation ）ABT 3.5MTS VLSFO + 0.1MT MGO
ADDITIONAL 1.5MT IFO 380 CST FOR BOLIER IN PORT
"ABT" MEANS AN ALLOWANCE OF +/-0.5KN ON SPEED AND 5PCT ON CONSUMPTION.
THERE IS NO MIXING OF BUNKERS ALLOWED.
SPEED/CONSUMPTION IS IN GOOD WEATHER /SEAS AND UNDERSTOOD TO MEAN ALL WEATHER CONDITIONS NOT EXCEEDING FORCE BEAUFORT SCALE 4 (MAX 16 KNOTS) AND DOUGLAS SEA STATE 3 (MAX 5 FEET AS UPPER LIMIT OF WIND DRIVEN SEAS), WITHOUT ADVERSE CURRENT AND NO NEGATIVE INFLUENCE FROM SWELL (MAX 5 FEET). VSL'S ENGINES MAY BURN DO, GO AND / OR EXTRA VLSFO DURING THE WHOLE CHARTER PERIOD WHILE ENTERING AND LEAVING PORT OR MANOUVERING OR STEAMING IN CONFINED OR CONGESTED/RESTRICTED/SHALLOW WATERS, TRANSITING CANALS, BALLASTING
BE EVALUATED SOLELY DURING PERIODS OF GOOD WHEATHER, WITH MINIMUM DURATION OF 24 SUCCESSIVE HOURS.
ALL DETAILS ABOUT
PLSD TO HEAR.
